item.title: Kyllei add a quote by David Suzuki
item.description: "We're in a giant car heading towards a brick wall and everyones arguing over where they're going to sit" -- David Suzuki

item.title: Kyllei add a quote by Daniel Quinn
item.description: "But why? Why do you need prophets to tell you how you ought to live? Why do you need anyone to tell you how you ought to live" -- Daniel Quinn

item.title: Kyllei add a quote by Niels Bohr
item.description: "It is the hallmark of any deep truth that its negation is also a deep truth" -- Niels Bohr

item.title: Kyllei add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's needs, but not every man's greed." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kyllei add a quote by John Keats
item.description: "The poetry of the earth is never dead." -- John Keats

item.title: Kyllei add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Oh Beautiful for smoggy skies, insecticided grain, For strip-mined mountain's majesty above the asphalt plain. America, America, man sheds his waste on thee, And hides the pines with billboard signs, from sea to oily sea." -- George Carlin

item.title: Kyllei add a quote by Pope John Paul II
item.description: "The earth will not continue to offer its harvest, except with faithful stewardship. We cannot say we love the land and then take steps to destroy it for use by future generations." -- Pope John Paul II

item.title: Kyllei add a quote by Maurice Maeterlinck
item.description: "If the bee disappeared off the face of the earth, man would only have four years left to live." -- Maurice Maeterlinck

item.title: Kyllei add a quote by Vandana Shiva
item.description: "Nature shrinks as capital grows. The growth of the market cannot solve the very crisis it creates." -- Vandana Shiva

item.title: Kyllei add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "I have lived with several Zen masters -- all of them cats." -- Eckhart Tolle
